alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Resort, or 15 miles northwest of Kendall, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miramar, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Medley, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, Miccosukee Resort, Pennsuco, Tamiami, The Hammocks and Kendall West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
